ru: Сохраняя поднятые пятки, на выдох кисти разведите в стороны на уровень плечевых суставов.
en: Keeping your heels lifted, exhale and spread your hands out to the sides at shoulder level.

ru: Пальцы кистей натяните на себя и кистями давите по сторонам.
en: Pull your fingers towards you and press the palms outward.
Pull the fingers of the hands toward you.
Extend your shoulder blades outward to both sides.
Press back with the back of your head.
Your heels are lifted off the mat.
Bring the lower part of the pelvis forward.
